mapper.update: update TB_CRM_PRODUCT_IMAGES set PRODUCT_ID = #{productId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, IS_MAIN = #{isMain,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, NAME = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SAVE_NAME = #{saveName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, size = #{size,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PATH = #{path,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CREATE_TIME = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, SORTNUM = #{sortnum,jdbcType=DECIMAL} where ID = #{id,jdbcType=DECIMAL}
mapper.select: select ID, PRODUCT_ID, IS_MAIN, NAME, SAVE_NAME, size, PATH, CREATE_TIME, SORTNUM from TB_CRM_PRODUCT_IMAGES
